column5: A friend of mine bought one of these reels years ago when float fishing was still quite young, but has never used the reel, is this reel any good?  I realise that the technology has changed just wondering.  Thanks for any feed back,  FLEX
Nothing wrong with the old Stream Runners, I'm still fishing with mine. A little bit heavier then whats out there today..
They are great. I actually have a spare spool available.
